issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: Блокировка аналитики Discord с помощью DNS-фильтра AdGuard
issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer; - [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed; - [x] This is not an ad/bug report. ### Problem description Здравствуйте, я задался вопросом блокировки аналитики в программе Discord. Я попросил нейросеть YandexGPT 5 Pro найти мне адреса Discord, которые отвечают за аналитику. Часть адресов уже содержатся в DNS-фильтре AdGuard, часть, нет. 1. API аналитики: **discord-analytics.com** (основной домен для сбора данных) - отсутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. **sentry.io** (отслеживание ошибок и производительности) - отсутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. _Вопрос блокировки sentry.io требует дополнительного изучения. Если адрес используется для отправки автоматических отчётов об ошибках, наверно, адрес блокировать не следует, но если адрес используется, например, для передачи сведений об устройстве и установленных или активных приложениях, я считаю, его следует заблокировать._ **raygun.io** (мониторинг пользовательских сессий) - присутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. 2. Специфичные поддомены Discord: **metrics.discordapp.com** - отсутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. **telemetry.discord.com** - отсутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. **science.discordapp.com** - отсутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. **tracking.discord.gg** - отсутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. 3. Сторонние сервисы: **amplitude.com** (аналитика поведения пользователей) - присутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. **segment.io** (сбор данных для маркетинга) - присутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. **google-analytics.com** (если интегрировано через плагины) - присутствует в DNS-фильтре AG. Я попробовал, у себя на устройстве, заблокировать адреса, которые отсутствуют в DNS-фильтре AdGuard, на работоспособность программы это ни как не повлияло. Windows 10 Home 22H2 x64 AdGuard 7.21.1 AdGuard DNS-фильтр 1.0.32.66 Discord Stable 426030 (41bf48e) Host 1.0.9201 x64 (66940) Build Override: N/A Windows 10 64-bit (10.0.19045) ### Proposed solution Пожалуйста, изучите вопрос аналитики и рекламы в Discord. В частости, в десктопной программе, веб-версии и приложениях для мобильных устройств. При необходимости, дополните DNS-фильтр AdGuard. Спасибо. ### Additional information

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
It took me months, but I finally tracked down that this filter isn't wide enough.  eBay often uses more URLs of similar form, depending on stage & type of offer.  Here're more:


https://www.ebay.com/bo/makeOffer/ _(covered by above, but included for completeness)_

https://www.ebay.com/bo/reviewCounterOffer/

https://www.ebay.com/gh/useracquisition?pg=bid&customReferer=https%253A%252F%252Fwww.ebay.com%252Fmye%252Fmyebay%252Fbidsoffers%253Fpg%253Dbid&v=2

https://pay.ebay.com/rxo/get-offers


& a bunch of other random format URLs.

I find `@@||ebay.com^/*Offer` covers & fixes all of it.

There was an ad at the end of each comic, and the New & Hot reappeared again. I didn't change any settings in AdGuard. I was only using the general AdGuard block list before. No other site/app had ads, just Webtoon. Somehow they circumvented ad blocking. I added a handful of new lists to AdGuard including Peter Lowe's, etc., and that helped with the ad at the end of the comic, but there is still the annoying New & Hot as well as pop ups like "buy our coins!!" I'm not sure what happened but the app is way more annoying to use now. ### Screenshots
